channel.title: Local-Seo on Clear Presence
channel.description: Recent content in Local-Seo on Clear Presence

item.title: Free 30-Min Google Business Profile Audit | Freelance Website Designer for Small Businesses
item.description: Your Google Business Profile is one of your most powerful tools for attracting local customers. But are you using it to its full potential? As a freelance web designer who helps small businesses in Utah, I’m offering a free, no-obligation 30-minute video chat to audit your Google Business Profile. Together, we’ll identify simple adjustments you can make to get more calls and new business.

item.title: Link Building Strategy in Utah | Freelance Website Designer for Small Businesses
item.description:
Link Building Strategy in Utah

For small businesses in Utah, getting noticed online can be a challenge. As a freelance web designer, I help my clients not only with their website’s design but also with their off-page SEO. A crucial part of that is link building. Quality backlinks are like votes of confidence for your website in the eyes of Google, and they are a powerful way to increase your authority and climb the search rankings. This post will explain how link building works and why it’s a game-changer for local SEO.

item.title: Off-Page Search Engine Optimization in Utah | Freelance Website Designer for Small Businesses
item.description: As a freelance web designer, I’m dedicated to helping small businesses in Utah succeed online. While a great website is the foundation, what happens off your website is just as important. Off-page Search Engine Optimization (SEO) is how you build authority and drive traffic to your site. In this post, we’ll explore the three pillars of effective off-page SEO and how they can bring long-term, organic growth to your business.

item.title: On-Page SEO Strategy in Utah | Freelance Website Designer for Small Businesses
item.description: If you’re a small business owner in Utah, you know how important it is to be visible to your local customers. As a freelance web designer, I specialize in helping small businesses like yours improve their online presence. A critical piece of that puzzle is on-page Search Engine Optimization (SEO). This post will walk you through the essential on-page SEO techniques that will help your website rank higher in search results and attract more customers.
